Friedman Schuman Layser Receives Recognition In The 16th Edition Of Best Law Firms
PRESS RELEASE
Published January 29, 2026
24-7 Press Release
Pennsylvania-based law firm earns rankings in five different practice areas
AUGUSTA, GA, January 29, 2026 /24-7PressRelease/ --
Friedman Schuman Layser
has been honored with recognition in multiple practice areas in the 16th edition of Best Law Firms, reflecting the firm's strong reputation for legal excellence and client service.
The firm received Metropolitan Tier 1 rankings in Personal Injury Litigation – Plaintiffs and Real Estate Law. It also received Metropolitan Tier 2 rankings in Employment Law – Management; Medical Malpractice Law – Plaintiffs; and Trusts and Estates for the Philadelphia metro area.
The Best Law Firms rankings are determined through a comprehensive evaluation process that includes client feedback, peer review, and an analysis of each firm's professional credentials. To qualify, law firms must have at least one attorney listed in The Best Lawyers in America. Rankings are presented at both national and regional levels.
This recognition highlights Friedman Schuman Layser's ongoing commitment to providing exceptional legal representation and achieving positive results for clients.
View the full list of Best Law Firm ranking here:
www.bestlawfirms.com
About Friedman Schuman Layser PC
Friedman Schuman Layser PC is a full-service law firm based in Fort Washington, PA. The firm has served countless families of wrongful death and personal injury victims across the state of Pennsylvania and New Jersey. Friedman Schuman Layser attorneys try cases in state and federal courts and handle investigations, discovery, and trial through verdict and appeal.
